item.title: Caching HTTP requests with Python
item.description: While writing a small Python library to download and parse a large CSV file from the web, I had to implement a strategy to cache the file locally and avoid downloading it on every execution. I wanted the library to download the file only once on the first execution and also when it has changed on the server. In this blog post I’m describing how to implement this with Python, basic HTTP headers and file manipulation.

item.title: How to List Rails Routes Programmatically
item.description: While developing a Rails app you can use the task bin/rails routes to list the available routes and their respective controllers and actions.
